topic.title: Can you send emails to a zeronet address from internet? and from internet to zeronet?
topic.body:
I have an id such as xxx@zerobit.id   
Seems that email can't be reached from normal internet if I understand correctly...

1603300553_1DwXAyvPbc3Uvc5bW3o2JTkisHPYB.body: thanks for the info, much appreciated

1603338108_14g2gXnsZdEPShFJkGdh5W3eGXmKz.body:
> [gitcenter](#comment_1399_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): It'd be interesting to run such a service. Sadly, I don't have a VPS so can't run it myself. Does anyone want to run it instead?

I have one (VPS) that's going to be mostly unused for a month or so.  Let me know if interested.
